description technical detail:
NEC MultiSync EA244UHD - 24" - LED-backlit LCD Monitor
The EA244UHD is a high performance display with the latest 4K UHD (3840 x 2160) super resolution. Offering the very DisplayPort connectivity, as well as a range of DVI and HDMI inputs, this monitor can be used in many mission critical applications, where decision making based on highly detailed, accurate and reliable image quality is demanded. Outstanding ergonomic comfort makes it very user-friendly and further enhances professional productivity.
display type: LED-backlit LCD monitor / TFT active matrix
features: Ambient light sensor, Rapid Response, ErgoDesign, cable management cover, Eco-Mode, ControlSync, Mobile High-Definition Link (MHL), Carbon Footprint Meter, Carbon Savings Meter, Human Sensor, NaViSet Administrator 2
image colour disclaimer: The image of the product displayed may be of a different colour
